name: Úlfur
description:
Hi, I am Amixli and I'm a game developener in training at the htk.

This game is my first semester project.

     

Credits

The music is specially made by my friend Velo C. Raptor.

The soundeffects are from Epidemic Sound.

Special Thanks to Chaxs!

      

Install Instructions

Download the file, unpack it and then simply

click on the .exe to play the game.
